timeline.bodyText: Instead of suppressing this warning and the ErrorProne warning, you could use clazz.cast(...) instead.  Any reason not to do that?
timeline.author: smillst

replies.bodyText: No reason, clazz.cast is indeed much nicer.
replies.author: wmdietl

timeline.bodyText:
/__w/1/s/framework/src/main/java/org/checkerframework/framework/util/ContractsUtils.java:131: warning: no @param for <T>

      *     null

+    private <T extends Contract> Set<T> getContract(

replies.bodyText: Could you please add those? I'm traveling the rest of the day and it would be great to have these changes in the release.
replies.author: wmdietl

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:typetools/checker-framework into fix-2985
